title: Import compatibility for Microsoft Remote Desktop Connection Manager v2.90 and above
author: unusedcow
body_snippet:
<!--- Provide a general summary of the issue in the Title above -->

## Expected Behavior
<!--- If you're describing a bug, tell us what should happen -->
<!--- If you're suggesting a change/improvement, tell us how it should work -->
Expecting successful file import for .rdg files used by Remote Desktop Connection Manager 2.90

## Current Behavior
<!--- If describing a bug, tell us what happens instead of the expected behavior -->
<!--- If suggesting a change/improvement, explain the d...

comments.author: HermanRas
comments.snippet:
Heloo, 

I have confirmed no schema changes for Remote desktop manager file version  v2.7 (2.70), v2.8 (2.80), v2.9 (2.90)

for a success full import on mRemoteNG build v1.77.1
open your current connection file and save it as a new file "backup" before editing YOUR_FILE_NAME.rdg with a text editor
![image](https://github.com/mRemoteNG/mRemoteNG/assets/38083493/6341db0c-16f5-4eb6-9d36-45f29ddc5eb8)

update the version from 2.80 or 2.90 
![image](https://github.com/mRemoteNG/mRemoteNG/ass...

comments.author: Wolvverine
comments.snippet:
After changing programVersion="2.93" to programVersion="2.7", the import ran without problems.

mRemoteNG v.1.77.3

comments.author: robertpopa22
comments.snippet: Triage refresh (P2): this issue has been inactive for a long time. Please retest on the latest build and share reproducible steps, expected vs actual behavior, and logs/screenshots. If there is no confirmation/update, maintainers can close it as stale or not reproducible.

comments.author: robertpopa22
comments.snippet:
Triage refresh (P4 version-label debt): this issue is tagged with legacy version labels. Please retest on the latest build (fork v1.79.x or upstream dev), then share reproducible steps and expected vs actual behavior. If still valid, keep open and relabel to current triage scope (for example Need 2 check). If fixed, close with resolution.

Current legacy version labels: 1.77.3
